entity.name: patient_chart
entity.query: select person_id, obs_id, cc.concept_class_id, cn.name as concept_name, cd.description as concept_description, d.name as drug, obs_datetime, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, cc2.concept_class_id as value_coded_concept_class_id, cn2.name as value_coded_concept_name, cd2.description as value_coded_concept_description from obs o inner join concept c on c.concept_id = o.concept_id inner join concept_class cc on cc.concept_class_id = c.class_id inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id left join concept_description cd on cd.concept_id = o.concept_id left join drug d on d.drug_id = o. value_drug left join concept c2 on c2.concept_id = value_coded left join concept_class cc2 on cc2.concept_class_id = c2.class_id left join concept_name cn2 on cn2.concept_id = o. value_coded left join concept_description cd2 on cd2.concept_id = o. value_coded
